transcripts.text: NOW YOU HEAR FROM GOD SO CLEARLY SINCE THIS ENCOUNTER IN HEAVEN.  I'M WONDERING IF GOD HAS SHOWN YOU ANYTHING, WHICH IS IN THE NEWS THIS MOMENT, AND THAT'S THE SUPREME COURT JUSTICE AND THE CONFIRMATION HEARINGS.  And I watched for a few minutes on TV, and my spirit couldn't take it, all the stuff I was feeling.  Have you seen the beginning from the end?  Have you seen what's going to happen?  What's God showing you?

Well, actually, I have something I haven't mentioned to you.  But remember when Mr.  Kavanaugh was on the stand to be confirmed and, you know, I heard this other name, Amy Barrett.  I heard that someone mentioned that.  And the Lord told me that Trump was going to save her because she was a shoe in for that position.  So he actually reserved her.  for this confirmation that the Lord told me that he already knew Amy would get in and that it was this other one was the confirmation of Kavanaugh, which he felt like would have a little bit more of a rough road.  So he chose Kavanaugh first.  And I was told this last year.  So this is amazing that now Amy comes up because the Lord told me that she was a sure fit.  She was a sure in for this.  And so I already know that she's going to be confirmed.
Now most of my prophetic friends, every one of them has said to me that even though he's not your consummate politician, President Trump, he's God's choice.  Do you feel that same way?

Yes, I believe that without a doubt.  I believe that the Lord had ordained this long ago, Sid.  And we've had conversations about this.  And my question is not some of the things that are happening now.  I have no questions.  I don't even worry about certain things because the Lord has told me that these are things that he preordained.  And President Trump being in there is the perfect timing for this individual.  And then everything that he's going to do, I can just tell you this, what the Lord has shown me just in the last week is we haven't even seen what Trump has planned.  There are things that are going to happen in this next four years.  after he is confirmed that President Trump will implement, there will be individuals that will be implemented that will completely uproot all the weeds, so to speak.  in our nation.  The system that is corrupt is going to be exposed.  I see a complete turnaround, an overhaul in our nation.  So there's better things coming than what even people know.

Now, you said something to me.  You saw named politicians in orange jumpsuits, high-level named politicians in orange jumpsuits.  When is that going to happen?  It seems like that everything that President Trump is accused of, the Democrats have done, and there hasn't been any repercussions.

Oh, yeah, but I'm telling you, I saw, in fact, the prophetic outlook that I have that I just received from the Lord is that this will be daily and it's going to start now.  Right now it's going to start and it will be daily.  And it's going to be people that you thought couldn't get caught because they seem to have escaped it.  They're already caught.  They have the documents.  Jesus showed me that Attorney General Barr and his people have all the documents that completely confirm the crimes that have been committed by people that are high up and that they know this.  And that is why there's such an onslaught right now is because they know they've been caught and they know when this comes out, they're done.  So they're doing everything they can.  That's why we need to stay in our positions with our drawn swords and do warfare in the spirit right now, Sid, because it's going to be daily that these people are going to be exposed.  People are going to be worn out.  Can you believe that they'd actually be worn out from hearing all the news of these people that were former heads of state, former ambassadors, former Hollywood stars?  All these people are going to be indicted, Sid.  They're going to get caught.
Everyone says to me, people say to me, we know they're as guilty as sin.
But they're so high up, they won't be touched.  That's just the way it is in this country.  You're saying different.  With Trump in there, they are.

Well, they will be.  they will be known for what they did.  And there there was one individual that will not go to jail because of their position.  But but that would be because they they have this this this way of doing things in the past that they don't touch certain individuals, especially with former presidents.  So they will be exposed.  But.  As far as bringing them to justice, I saw that that individual would not be completely punished for that, that it would be known and they would be discredited.  Everyone will be known, but not everyone will essentially go to jail, so to speak, Sid.
YOU GAVE ME A BIT OF A CLUE.  THE REASON WE ARE SEEING NAMED POLITICIANS JUMP IN ON THE BIDEN BANDWAGON IS IF HE DOESN'T WIN, THEY DO GO TO PRISON.  That's what I think I hear you saying.

That is absolutely what I'm saying, Sid.  And this is a time when we need to hold fast in what we know and believe.  And we need to stay in there with the Spirit of God.  And the Spirit of God is calling for justice and righteousness.  to be full reign in this country.  And the only way we do that is that the redeemed of the Lord need to say so.  They need to stand up and refuse to let these people get away with it.  I'm telling you, whatever we refuse on this earth is refused in heaven.  Whatever we bind on the earth is bound.  Whatever we permit on the earth is permitted.  That's what the Lord Jesus Christ said when he was on the earth.

LET ME ASK YOU THIS.  YOU HAVE JUST COME OUT WITH A BRAND NEW BOOK AND WE'RE DOING SOMETHING ALMOST UNPRECEDENTED.  WE'RE MAKING THE E-BOOK OF THIS BRAND NEW BOOK AVAILABLE FOR ANYONE THAT JUST CLICKS BELOW THE SCREEN.  OR They go to SidRoth.org slash country and it will immediately get into your home.  Why should someone want it immediately in their home?

Well, because the Lord has given me not only the prayer points, but the way to implement these things.  He's given me his heart for this country.  And so I want to have people praying the same thing that the Lord has given to me to pray.  So you'd be praying all these prayer points daily and that unity in the body of Christ, the body of Messiah would bring us into maturity and it would not permit the evil to happen.  I saw that all these things that are coming upon the earth, they did not have to happen.  The Lord said that if the body of Messiah would not permit them, they would not be allowed.

If everyone that is watching this, and sometimes we get a million views, if everyone that is watching it downloads your book, the e-book, and does what God has instructed you to tell us, Paint me a picture of what America will be like under the next Trump presidency.

Sid, I saw without a doubt that the glory of the Lord ascended on the body of believers everywhere.  I saw that other nations actually started to follow suit.  Freedom started happening.  I saw countries like Australia start to come around as well, and they just followed with that freedom that happened in our country.  I saw that we were going to have the freedom to have open air meetings.  We were going to have stadiums again.  It was just going to be like Billy Graham all over again.  It was going to be people like that were going to be preaching and many were going to come to the Lord.  I saw this all happen.  I saw notable miracles.  I saw that you're going to have plenty of material, plenty of people.  to have on your show, to talk about what God's doing.  This is what I saw for our country.  I saw our economy come back.  I saw people were given incentive to start new businesses.  I saw a lot of money being made available to start new businesses.  That's what I saw.  Because, you know, President Trump, that's his heart, is for the American people to have the freedom to prosper in this country.

Well, you know, one of the big problems that I see is race relations, just all the different separation of people.  And do you know what the difference maker is?  We've been talking about it, the greater glory of God.  I pray that you receive.  everything God has for you.  I would like you to get this book because you need to live in a country such as Kevin just described.  Now, if you want to download this book right now and be a difference maker, go to SidRoth.org slash country or just click the link below.
